The country mans case uncased or, The plain-dealers prayer for a registry.
1 sheet ([1] p.) : ill.
Printed in the year, 1678. And are to be sold by John Oliver in the Old-Baily, over against the George near Ludgate, London, : [1678]
Verse: "AND is the Bill committed, Heaven be prais'd ..." Reproduction of original in the British Library.
